original_text: Then Darius the king made a decree, and search was made in the house of the rolls, where the treasures were laid up in Babylon.
korean_text: 이에 다리오 왕이 조서를 내려 문서창고 곧 바벨론의 보물을 쌓아둔 보물전각에서 조사하게 하여

sentences.original_text: Then Darius the king made a decree
and search was made in the house of the rolls
where the treasures were laid up in Babylon
